Hello there! Welcome to my site.

I am a doctoral researcher at the Collaborative Research Center (Sonderforschungsbereichs -- [SFB 1102](https://sfb1102.uni-saarland.de)) at Saarland University, Department of Psychology and Department of Language Science and Technology. [Prof. Jutta Kray](https://www.uni-saarland.de/lehrstuhl/kray/team/jk.html) and [Prof. Vera Demberg](https://www.uni-saarland.de/lehrstuhl/demberg/members/verademberg.html) are my advisors.

My PhD research is focused on how we make sense of spoken language under adverse listening conditions.
I study when (and how) context helps us understand degraded speech,
and when context is not much helpful.

I expect to complete my PhD by the end of September this year. Offers for postdoc positions are welcome :)
